Invite.InviteNotice:
Activity description

For example: The friend you invited through the link you sent to register as a user, his every deal 0.1%

will become your reward income, if he trades the number of 1 BTC, Your reward is 0.001 BTC


1. Log on to the fFirefoxOTC, in (sharing rewards) on this page of the 'Invitation link' to copy to a friend circle or micro-letter friends;

2. Friends successfully through your invitation to register and successful trading you can get a digital currency award, The amount is 0.1% of the turnover;

3. Reward in the form of a digital currency, and send it to your wallet immediately after each transaction is completed;

4. No upper limit, please participate actively;

5. This site reserves the right to interpret the event;
Invite.LinkContent: Billion-level OTC digital currency over-the-counter trading platform FireFoxOTC landed Hong Kong, exclusive support BTC, ETH, LTC, OSC trading, if you want to become a winner in life, the body alongside billions of possessions, then register quickly!

Publish.Notice:
Notice

If you are trading digital coins frequently, you can publish your own digital currency trading AD. If you only want to buy or sell one time, we recommend that you trade directly from the list of trading centers.

Advertising is free, but your FirefoxOTC wallet needs to have at least a number of currencies that you want to trade, and the trade ads you publish will appear on the list.

After the completion of the transaction advertisement, the user is required to pay the {fee}% fee for each successful transaction.
Publish.MinQtyError: The minimum number of coins is 0.001
Publish.MaxMinError: The minimum number of number coins cannot be greater than the maximum value
Publish.BalanceLimitContent: Cannot publish advertisement, your balance is insufficient
Publish.MessageNotice: Note: Your payment message will be an important basis for the transaction, if your payment information is not complete, the transaction may not be completed.
Publish.MessageTemplate:
Micro-letter: 88888888
 Alipay: 180xxxxxxx zhang 
 Sincere cooperation, mutual b

Buy.Title: How much do you want to buy?
Buy.Name: Seller
Buy.Qty: Please enter the quantity you want to buy
Buy.TradeNoticeContent:
1. Please understand each other's transaction details before trading.
2. If you encounter a trade dispute, you can resolve the problem by appealing.
3. After you initiate a transaction request, the Digital Currency to be traded will be locked and protected by the FirefoxOTC. If you are the buyer, after initiating the transaction request, please pay before the order deadline, and then mark the payment as completed. The seller will release the Digital Currency in escrow upon receipt of payment.
4. The escrow service guarantees the interests of the seller and the buyer, in case of dispute, we will evaluate all the evidence information you provide and release the managed Digital Currency to the rightful owner.
Buy.MessageNotice: Note: Your payment message will be an important basis for the transaction, if your payment information is not complete, the transaction may not be completed.
Buy.MessageTemplate:
Micro-letter: 88888888
 Alipay: 180xxxxxxx zhang 
 Sincere cooperation, mutual b

Dialog.CancelContent: Are you sure you cancel the order?
Dialog.PaidContent: Please make sure that the payment is marked after the transfer accounts!If you have not yet paid your own mark, it will likely affect your account credit, please use this feature carefully!
Dialog.PaidCoinNotice: After the coin is determined, the digital currency will not be recovered! Please make sure you have received the payment from the buyer after the transfer accounts.

DetailBuy.Title: Purchase Order ( {order_no}) Details
DetailBuy.Name: Seller
DetailBuy.TradeMsg:
Trading tip

1. The number currency you are dealing with has been locked, and the transaction will be canceled automatically at the specified time.

2. Please note the order number when transferring payment to facilitate the confirmation of the transaction.
DetailBuy.TradeNotice:
Considerations

1. If you are the buyer, be sure to complete the payment before the order closes and mark the payment completed.

2. If you are the seller, please ensure the real receipt of payment, release the digital currency to complete the transaction.
DetailBuy.ProblemNotice: If the buyer has not paid but marked the payment, the seller does not release the digital currency or other reasons for the dispute, you can appeal to the transaction; 40 minutes after the order is created, the complaint can be initiated.(during the appeal, the FirefoxOTC will freeze the number of transactions in the order)
DetailBuy.DisputedContent: The order into the representations in the case of failure to negotiate with the trader, the fire Fox Customer will intervene mediation; Please prepare the relevant evidence for submission.

Dialog.CancelContent: Are you sure you cancel the order?
Dialog.PaidContent: Please make sure that the payment is marked after the transfer accounts! If you have not yet paid your own mark, it will likely affect your account credit, please use this feature carefully!

(during the appeal, the FirefoxOTC will freeze the number of transactions in the order)

Recharge.NoticeBTC:
Instructions

1. Use BTC Address recharge needs 1 of the network to confirm to the account, the use of the station to transfer accounts between the accounts without network confirmation, can be real-time to the account.

2. The BTC address is prohibited from recharging assets other than BTC, and any BTC assets filled with BTC addresses will not be recovered. Recharge minimum 0.001BTC, less than 0.001BTC will not be able to account.
Recharge.NoticeETH:
Instructions

1. Use ETH address recharge needs 12 of the network to confirm to the account, the use of the station to transfer accounts between the accounts without network confirmation, can be real-time to the account.

2. The ETH address is prohibited from recharging assets other than ETH, and any ETH assets filled with ETH addresses will not be recovered. Recharge minimum 0.001ETH, less than 0.001ETH will not be able to account.
Recharge.NoticeLTC:
Instructions

1. Use LTC address recharge needs 1 of the network to confirm to the account, the use of the station to transfer accounts between the accounts without network confirmation, can be real-time to the account.

2. The LTC address is prohibited from recharging assets other than LTC, and any LTC assets filled with LTC addresses will not be recovered. Recharge minimum 0.001LTC, less than 0.001LTC will not be able to account.
Recharge.NoticeOSC:
Instructions

1. Use OSC address recharge needs 12 of the network to confirm to the account, the use of the station to transfer accounts between the accounts without network confirmation, can be real-time to the account.

2. The OSC address is prohibited from recharging assets other than OSC, and any OSC assets filled with OSC addresses will not be recovered. Recharge minimum 0.001OSC, less than 0.001OSC will not be able to account.

BindGoogleAuth.Help:
How do I install Google Verification code?

iphone search Google authenticator download apps in App Store

Android phones search for 'Google Authenticator' in the Android app market, or search for Google authenticator download apps

After binding, login, mention, required to pay Google two times to verify, see Detailed tutorial
